description:
Let 1000 lumens light your way. From dark trails to less than well lit bike lanes, the Micro Drive Pro 1000 sends an even blanket of light out in front of you. With 7 modes to choose from, you have the option of a subtle “be seen” amount of light, or a darkness melting amount of light, options are only a click away.

  • 7 lighting modes, 4 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 1000 lumens (1.5h), 600 lumens (3.25h), 300 lumens (6h), 125 lumens (11h), flash – 20 lumens (60h), pulse – 100 lumens (14h) and day flash – 700 lumens (40h)
  • 8 LED array creates a wide flood light
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Easy USB-C charging takes only ~4 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Rugged aluminum body with integrated cooling fins dissipates heat well
  • Tool-free mounting is easy to pop on and off, or swap between bikes
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from even the heaviest downpours
name: Lezyne Micro Drive Pro 1000 Front Light
